data.description: A bunch of modules to DB interaction.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Tk::DBIx::Tree

    This is a megawidget to display a sql statement from your database
    in a Tree Widget. When you've got one of those nasty
    self-referential tables that you want to bust out into a tree, this
    is the module to check out in Perl/Tk.

    Tk::DBIx::Form Tk::DBIx::Form is a Megawidget offering edit, delete
    or insert operations for table records.

    Tk::DBIx::Table This is a megawidget to display a sql statement
    from your database. The features are: - every column has a
    ResizeButton for flexible width - The user can activate every Button
    and this will sort the column in the direction 'ASC', 'Desc' or
    'None'.

    More Information? look here:
    http://xpix.dieserver.de/content/perlmoduls/tk_dbi/

    cu xpix
